Articles.Content:
When writing things, You can color them by highlighting what you want and them pressing the large a and selecting color. This is useful for replys less that ten characters so you can write whatever and the do something like stopstopstop and make it white. It will appear invisible. This is also useful for pointing out important things.

Cats in space, A article by musicpenguin

To get a cat in space you need A CAT, A rocket and Gravity

Well, I hope you like this little thing I found. Thanks!
